title: Chocolate Cream Cheese Delight
directions: Mix flour and butter together, then add ½ chopped walnuts.
Then press in a 9x13 inch pan. Bake at 350* for 15 minutes, then cool.
Mix cream cheese, 1 cup of the Cool Whip, and powdered sugar together and beat until fluffy. Spread on top of first layer.
Mix chocolate instant pudding and milk together and prepare pudding as directed on package. Spread on top of second layer.
Spread the remaining Cool Whip on top. Sprinkle with crushed nuts and refrigerate for several hours to set up.
